text: Visvasigale, nivu allahana sahayakaragiri – maryamara putra isa tam'ma apta sisyarodane ‘‘allahana margadalli nanage neravaguvavaru yariddare?’’ Endante. Avara apta sisyaru ‘‘navu allahana sahayakaru’’ endaru. A balika isra'ilara santatiyallina ondu gumpu visvasavittitu mattu innondu gumpu dhikkarisitu. Navu visvasigalige avara satrugala virudda neravu odagisidevu mattu avaru vijayigaladaru
